spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 1,506 Mastery for 15 sec. When this effect expires it jumps once to a nearby ally, granting them 297 Mastery for 8 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Burn your target with a bolt of Azerite, dealing 285 Fire damage. If the target has less than 20% health or more than 80% health, the cooldown is reduced by 30 sec.

If Reaping Flames kills an enemy, its cooldown is lowered to 5 sec and it will deal 100% increased damage on its next use.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

If your target is below 20% health, the chance for extra damage is increased by 400%.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Energy spent on them, heal you for 121, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 398 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 398 over 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Versatility by 1 for 14 sec, stacking up to 8 times. Being the vicitim of a loss of control or movement impairing effect also grants a stack of Strife.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Maul deals 806 additional damage, and Maul reduces the cost of your next Ironfur by 15 Rage stacking up to 3 times.
Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to leak Azerite on the ground around you. Standing in the Azerite increases your primary stat by 261 for 8 sec.

name: The Sentinel's Eternal Refuge

playable_classes.display_string: Classes: Druid, Demon Hunter, Monk, Rogue

description: Her spirit is bound within the leather of these treads, anchoring her to this world.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Anklets of Chosen Renewal

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Tiger's Fury increases your chance to Critically Strike for 10 sec, starting at 6% and increasing by 1.0% every 2 sec.
(4) Set: Critical Strikes with your combo point-generating abilities increase the direct damage of your next Ferocious Bite and Rampant Ferocity or Primal Wrath by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.

Transmogrified to:
Eviscerators of the Greatlynx

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Ominous Chromatic Essence

spells.description: Equip: Resonate with the power of your sworn dragonflight, granting you 535 secondary stat. Allies sworn to a different dragonflight gain 56 secondary stat from your Resonance. You may only benefit from one Resonance per Flight.
Use: Attune with a nearby dragonflight Oathstone in the Dragon Isles.

description: The beauty of its swirling colors belies the cruel experiments that followed.

spells.description:
Use: Take what is rightfully yours, gorging on your target's essence to deal 3.1 million Shadow damage and healing you for 464,238 over 2 sec. Damage and healing increased based on the target's missing health.

Cooldown reduced by 60 sec if this effect kills the target. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Tabard of the Lightbringer

spells.description: Use: Suffuses the wearer with the Light. (30 Min Cooldown)

description: May you always bring light into dark places.
